attributes.action: For our kids to repeat a year in school.
attributes.additional_details: Wee would like all governments across the UK and Northern Ireland to agree to this that all kids in every year should repeat this last year to give them a chance to catch up cause if they don't it will take them years to catch up and will always be behind a year it would give alot of kids a chance with their exams to get the marks they deserve and would be less pressure on their mental health especially when it comes to the exmas they would have the adequate teaching for them
attributes.background: For our kids to repeat a year in school they have lost nearly 12months of teaching in a classroom with teachers that are professionally trained to give our kids an education parents are not trained to teach education to the same level and our kids have lost so much
